name: SEVEN
tagline: The Company That Exceeds Your Expectations
description:
SEVEN is the full-cycle mobile, web, and custom software development company ready to become your reliable 360º technological partner.
Committed to innovations and excellence, since 2007 we've been providing high-quality technological solutions and developing software for businesses that want to become more innovative, profitable, efficient, and more agile.
 
Our strong technological background and in-depth expertise across healthcare, retail, social media, and experience collaborating with enterprise businesses and startups allow us to build dedicated teams of exceptional vetted IT specialists for our clients, provide a broad range of services and execute tasks of any complexity to develop custom solutions for our partners.
 
We offer custom software development in the following verticals:
• Enterprise: Business Intelligence Software, SaaS/PaaS Solutions, CRM/ERP/CMS, Customer Portals, eCommerce platforms 
• Healthcare: Telemedicine apps, HIE/EHR software, IoT-based remote monitoring apps, Video dictionaries and education tools, Specialized smart TV platforms, Treatment planners. 
• Start-ups: Social networks, Dating mobile apps, Marketplaces, Online shopping platforms, Stock Exchanges, AR apps. 
• Live Chat Software: P2P counseling apps, Pay-per-minute/pay-per-session chats for lawyers, physicians, fortune tellers, coaches.
